Features.Name: Lucky Dice
Features.Details: Once per Adventure add 1 to any dice roll.

Features.Name: Sheriff's Badge
Features.Details: Once per Adventure give all heros +2 shots or +2 combat for an activation

Features.Name: Ancient Coin
Features.Details: Once per Adventure, fully heal your health

Features.Name: Amulet of Heinghal
Features.Details: Once per adventure, add an extra D6 damage to a sibgle Hit

Features.Name: Lucky Hat
Features.Details: Once per Adventure, re-roll any one die.

Features.Name: Merchant's Apron
Features.Details: When you sell a Gear/Artifact card in town, gain +10% rounded up to neares $5 and recover 1 Grit

Features.Name: Conversion
Features.Details: Everytime you visit a saloon roll a D6 on a 1 or 2 you have fallen and lose this ability.

Notes.Title: Level 2
Notes.Body: Iron Concentration re-roll 1 wound roll a turn

Notes.Title: Farmstead Defender
Notes.Body: Re-roll 1 hit roll if there are no adjacent enemies
